content.question: During a television interview on July 1, 2018, Senator Lindsey Graham stated that "one of the concepts that really means a lot in America is stare decisis. That means you don't overturn precedent unless there's a good reason." About which ongoing debate was Senator Graham sharing his position?

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors illustrated in different scenarios in context.
